events.name: Lithium-ion battery recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: S-LCA methodology and social impact assessment
events.wd_label: S-LCA methodology and social impact assessment
events.wd_description: Social Life Cycle Assessment (S-LCA) is a methodology to analyze the potential positive and negative social impacts of products along their life cycle. S-LCA provides complementary information to Environmental Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) by focusing on socio-economic interactions and the organizational and societal context of activities in the supply chain.
events.description: Social Life Cycle Assessment (S-LCA) is a methodology to analyze the potential positive and negative social impacts of products along their life cycle. S-LCA provides complementary information to Environmental Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) by focusing on socio-economic interactions and the organizational and societal context of activities in the supply chain.

events.name: S-LCA methodology
events.wd_description: S-LCA analyzes potential social impacts of products along their life cycle, similar to environmental LCA but with a focus on socio-economic aspects.
events.description: S-LCA analyzes potential social impacts of products along their life cycle, similar to environmental LCA but with a focus on socio-economic aspects.

events.name: Social impacts
events.wd_description: S-LCA assesses the potential positive and negative social impacts of products.
events.description: S-LCA assesses the potential positive and negative social impacts of products.

events.name: Socio-economic interactions
events.wd_description: S-LCA focuses on the socio-economic interactions of activities in the product supply chain.
events.description: S-LCA focuses on the socio-economic interactions of activities in the product supply chain.

events.name: Organizational and societal context
events.wd_description: S-LCA analyzes the organizational and societal context of activities in the supply chain.
events.description: S-LCA analyzes the organizational and societal context of activities in the supply chain.

events.name: Importance of site-specific data in S-LCA
events.wd_label: Importance of site-specific data in S-LCA
events.wd_description: Social impacts depend on the specific context of the product's supply chain, requiring the collection of site-specific data. Social hotspots are defined as activities in regions where social risks or opportunities exist.
events.description: Social impacts depend on the specific context of the product's supply chain, requiring the collection of site-specific data. Social hotspots are defined as activities in regions where social risks or opportunities exist.

events.name: Site-specific data
events.wd_description: S-LCA requires the collection of site-specific data to accurately assess social impacts.
events.description: S-LCA requires the collection of site-specific data to accurately assess social impacts.

events.name: Social hotspots
events.wd_description: Social hotspots are activities in regions where social risks or opportunities are present.
events.description: Social hotspots are activities in regions where social risks or opportunities are present.
